title: Robert Alter to speak on challenges of translating the Bible (The University of Chicago)
text: ( Source : The University of Chicago ) Few texts pose as many challenges to the modern translator as the Hebrew Bible , with its rich and complex language, syntax and style. Robert Alter , whose translations of Genesis and The Five Books of
